"Eid Sweets" Event
2  April,  2024
Best Buddies Qatar organized a sweets preparation and making event to celebrate World Autism Awareness Day, generously sponsored by Golden Gazelle, and with the participation of members from both Qatar University and Hamad Bin Khalifa University, along with their friends from the Citizen Program. The event was characterized by lively interactive atmospheres, where friends worked together in making and decorating candy molds in blue color and with the logo, wrapping them to be distributed to employees and the community to raise awareness about autism spectrum disorder.
